output: github_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(httr)
```


```{r import and tidy MV crash}

crash_dat = 
  GET("https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/h9gi-nx95.csv", 
      query = list("$limit" = 5000)) %>% 
  content("parsed") %>%
  as_tibble()

crash_dat_2020 = 
  GET("https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/h9gi-nx95.csv", 
      query = list("$where" = "crash_date between '2020-01-01T00:00:00' and '2020-10-31T12:00:00'", "$limit" = 50000)) %>% 
  content("parsed") %>%
  as_tibble()



```

```{r import and tidy bikes}

bike_dat = 
  GET("https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/uczf-rk3c.csv", 
      query = list("$limit" = 55000)) %>% 
  content("parsed") %>%
  as_tibble()

```
